#summary How to use the Hale Aloha CLI (Command Line Interface).
#labels Featured

*Table of Contents* 
<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= 1.0 Download =
Please download the latest distribution of the Hale Aloha CLI from the [http://code.google.com/p/hale-aloha-cli-tnt/downloads/list Downloads] page.

= 2.0 Install =
To install the Hale Aloha CLI, unzip the distribution.
Open a command prompt, and go to the extracted hale-aloha-tnt directory.
Type "java -jar hale-aloha-tnt" to run the CLI.
Type "help" for a list of commands.
